div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
الحمد للّه الأعز قد زاد النّيل المبارك
إصبعين عن ثمانية أذرع المنّة للّه
عز وجل

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ăl ḥamdu li l lāhi ăl ʾaʿazzi qad zāda ăn nīlu ăl mubāraku
ʾiṣbaʿayni ʿan ṯamāniyaẗi ʾaḏruʿ:ini ăl minnaẗu li l lāhi
ʿazza wa ǧalla

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
Praise be to God, the most Mighty. The blessed Nile has already risen
to two fingers above eight cubits. And the thanksgiving is due to God,
He is mighty and sublime.
